# Data import

## interactive with Operation System[OS]
get current working loaction:
```{r}
getwd()
```

Set current working loaction:
```{r eval=FALSE}
setwd("C:/Users/User/Desktop/Mission/R/R_code/Data_Pipeline/Book")
```


show location files:
```{r}
dir(getwd())
```

create file A B C:
```{r eval=FALSE}
cat("file A\n", file = "A")
cat("file B\n", file = "B")
cat("file C\n", file = "C")
file.append("A", rep("B", 10))

file.show("A")
```

delete a file with unlink or file.remove():
```{r eval=FALSE}
unlink("C")
file.remove("A", "B")
```

check a file existence:
```{r}
dir.exists('test_file')
```

create a file :
```{r}
dir.create('test_file')
```

Download Files:
```{r eval=FALSE}
download.file()
```

untar a file:
```{r eval=FALSE}
untar()
```

check file info:
```{r }
library(dplyr)
dir(getwd())%>%file.info()
```
